item.title: Wildgate is a new space based team shooter coming to PC, PS5, and Xbox Series XS
item.content:encoded:
https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/03/25/wildgate-is-a-new-space-based-team-shooter-coming-to-pc-ps5-and-xbox-series-xs/

Moonshot Games has announced a brand new team based shooter set in space, and it is called Wildgate. Wildgate will mix up space combat, looting, ship boarding, and a whole lot of first person shooting. If that sounds like something right up your street, you wonâ€™t have to wait long as there is going to be a  Wildgate community playtest from April 10th to April 14th which will be on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series XS.

In Wildgate, five teams of four known as Prospectors travel through hostile regions of space, which are randomised each time. to search for a treasure known as the Artifact. Finding the Artifact and escaping with it is one way to win the match. The other is to dominate by destroying the rival team ships however you can. That includes facing off in ship to ship combat or boarding enemy ships to sabotage them from within.

Going back to the community playtest, Moonshot Studios has stated that the full game will be available to play, but signing up for the playtest does not guarantee that you will get a key for it. It has also been confirmed that cross play between the three platforms will be available, and at release there will be cross progression too. The game will also feature audio and text in the following languages; English, French, German, Italian, Castilian Spanish, Latin American Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Korean, Japanese, and Simplified Chinese. There will also be traditional Chinese text.

If you are playing on PC the specs needed as follows:

Minimum Specification:

Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
Windows 11
Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K or AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 Ti [8 GB] or Radeon RX 5700 XT [8 GB] Memory: 16 GB
Direct X: Version 12
Storage: SSD, 50 GB
Network: Broadband Internet Connection

Recommended system requirements:

Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
Windows 11
Processor: Intel i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
Memory: 16GB RAM
Storage: 50GB available
Direct X: Version 12
Network: Broadband Internet Connection

All the progress made in the Wildgate playtest will not carry over to the full release.

Source: Welcome to Wildgate
